subtitleNullable: 50K images with cat face bounding boxes
descriptionNullable:
This dataset contains photos of cats with according face/head bounding boxes

# How this data was collected

YOLOv8 model was trained on available data and fine-tuned on manually labeled samples. High-confidence predictions then were applied to unlabeled data.

Information about label origin is available in additional `info.csv` file

# Usability

Dataset is provided in COCO format and additional CSV file.

# Quality

As most of the labels were autogenerated, false labels are viable (though I expect there to be only a few). Consider selecting only part of the dataset based on prediction score and origin.

# Info (`info.csv`)

- x — x_min in pixels
- y — y_min in pixels
- width — bbox width in pixels
- height — bbox height in pixels
- rotation — you can ignore it, all boxes are not rotated
- origin — describes the origin of label
    - manual — manual labeling
    - prediction-unchecked — predicted by YOLO model
    - prediction-changed — predicted by YOLO model and modified manually
    - prediction — predicted by YOLO model and manually approved
- score — if origin of label is prediction, this specifies prediction confidence level
title: Cat Faces Detection
subtitle: 50K images with cat face bounding boxes
description:
This dataset contains photos of cats with according face/head bounding boxes

# How this data was collected

YOLOv8 model was trained on available data and fine-tuned on manually labeled samples. High-confidence predictions then were applied to unlabeled data.

Information about label origin is available in additional `info.csv` file

# Usability

Dataset is provided in COCO format and additional CSV file.

# Quality

As most of the labels were autogenerated, false labels are viable (though I expect there to be only a few). Consider selecting only part of the dataset based on prediction score and origin.

# Info (`info.csv`)

- x — x_min in pixels
- y — y_min in pixels
- width — bbox width in pixels
- height — bbox height in pixels
- rotation — you can ignore it, all boxes are not rotated
- origin — describes the origin of label
    - manual — manual labeling
    - prediction-unchecked — predicted by YOLO model
    - prediction-changed — predicted by YOLO model and modified manually
    - prediction — predicted by YOLO model and manually approved
- score — if origin of label is prediction, this specifies prediction confidence level
